section.name: Usage
section.p: flex-cairngorm-stubbed-crud-archetype is a plain classic maven archetype (v2). Just add fna repository (http://fna.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/fna/fna_m2_repository/) to your repositories list.
Once installed in your local archetype catalog, in order to create a project from your local archetype repository, you may use the following syntax:
